contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Utelle}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Utelle |image = Utelle 0545.JPG |image coat of arms = Blason ville fr Utelle 06.svg |region = Provence-Alpes-CÃ´te d'Azur |department = Alpes-Maritimes |arrondissement = Nice |canton = Lantosque |INSEE = 06151 |postal code = 06450 |mayor = Bernard Cortes |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = |longitude = 7.2481 |latitude = 43.9186 |elevation m = 800 |elevation min m = 126 |elevation max m = 2080 |area km2 = 67.97 |population = 693 |population date = 2008 }} '''Utelle''' ({{lang-oc|Uels}}) is a [[commune in France|commune]] about {{Convert|40|mi|km|0}} northeast of [[Nice]] in the [[Alpes-Maritimes]] [[Departments of France|department]] in southeastern [[France]]. ==Geography== It is perched on a hill along the [[Vesubie Gorge]] not far from the [[Mercantour National Park]]. ==Sights== Formerly an agricultural village planted with numerous olive trees, the village is near the Madonne d'Utelle, a chapel that serves as an annual pilgrimage site for local [[Catholics]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|506 |1968|516 |1975|451 |1982|398 |1990|456 |1999|488 |2008|693 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== [[Communes of the Alpes-Maritimes department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{en icon}} {{Fr icon}} & ([[Occitan language|Occitan]]) [http://mtcn.free.fr/mtcn-traditional-music-midi-chime.php Chimes from County of Nice] : ''tirignoun'' (chime) from Utelle. {{commonscat}} {{Alpes-Maritimes communes}} [[Category:Communes of Alpes-Maritimes]] {{AlpesMaritimes-geo-stub}}
